page.title: 13HOMELIFE
page.content: In 1985/1986 some familes live in houses or flats owned by the{Council or other landlords,but many people own their{own houses}or are buying them with the help of a mortgage. There is{no gas}main in Ullesthorpe so, people either cook by electricity or "bottled" gas.Many people now have micro_wave ovens which reduce the time needed to prepare a meal, as food can be removed from the freezer and ready in a very few minutes. Local children seem to be quite equally divided about whether they would prefer hot or cold meals. Many of the families have domestic pets with cats and dogs being most popular.Others include rabbits,guinea pigs, hamsters and a parrot.
